DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare the clinical efficacy and safety of Levocetirizine vs. Desloratadine in patients suffering from Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria (CIU) measured by the mean pruritus severity score over the first week of treatment
DOC.criteria: At visit 1: Clinical history of Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria for a period of at least 6 weeks during the last 3 months without an identifiable cause At visit 2 (after a baseline period of at least 3 days): patient with adequate signs of CIU, both in terms of symptoms and severity. Any condition that would interfere with the evaluation of the therapeutic response.
